reviewText: turner home entertainment starz universal pictures inc. tom and jerry puss gets the boot on vhs october 23rd mgm cartoon
Very accommodating and helpful. Gave prompt responses to my inquiries.  Would do business with you again.

Tom and Jerry was my favourite cartoon when I was a boy and this DVD contains some of the best cartoons of this inseparable duo. The animation and music are excellent. This is real value for your money.

These magical and hilarious cartoons are recommended for all Tom and Jerry fans, both the young and young at heart.

These are some of the best cartoons i remember watching as a kid and i still get a big kick out of them. i still can laugh so hard that my stomach hurts. these on this tape i think are some of the best if not the best tom and jerry cartoons made. you hardly see them on tv nowadays uncut. its great to see them in their true original form!  Watch it and laugh!!

When I first rented this movie at blockbuster, i was really excited. and it was really worth the watch,and if you love Tom and Jerry, I reccomend you to rent or buy this video. it even has the first ever Tom and Jerry episode, "puss gets the boot". this video is a true masterpiece.
